summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FocusFlow weekly report feature and responsive design improvements. All core weekly report functionality working perfectly including AI insights generation. Minor mobile overlay issue identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Emergent badge overlay intercepts clicks on mobile bottom report button
ui_bugs.workaround: Report button accessible via mobile menu and header icon

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/report/weekly returns complete data structure
Backend: POST /api/report/generate-insights generates AI analysis successfully
Weekly Report dialog opens from sidebar button (desktop)
Weekly Report dialog opens from header icon (desktop/tablet)
Weekly Report displays tasks completed, focus time, pomodoros, completion rate
Weekly Report daily breakdown chart displays correctly with 7 days
AI Insights generation works with GPT-5.2 integration
AI Insights shows summary, strengths, improvements, recommendations
Responsive design: Desktop view (1920px) - full 3-column layout working
Responsive design: Tablet view (768px) - sidebar hidden, no overlapping elements
Responsive design: Mobile view (390px) - timer at top, proper layout
Mobile menu button expands/collapses stats and actions correctly
Mobile menu shows stats (Done, Mins, Pomo, Backlog) when expanded
Mobile bottom action bar Add and Prioritize buttons functional
Weekly Report accessible from mobile menu and header across all screen sizes
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Adjust z-index or positioning of mobile bottom action bar to prevent Emergent badge overlay interference. All core functionality working perfectly.

success_percentage.backend: 100% (22/22 tests passed including new weekly report endpoints)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core features working, minor mobile overlay issue)
success_percentage.integration: 100% (seamless weekly report and AI insights integration)
